description: A collection of circles in a thin rectangular formation with several diagonal lines forming V-shapes along the rectangular portion. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a dark green triangle in the top portion of the formation, a larger dark green triangle just below the center of the formation, and a smaller dark green triangle to the right of the large one.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
